short.tr: Oynatma hÄ±zÄ±, ses, ilerleme Ã§ubuÄŸu ve daha fazlasÄ± ile YouTube Shorts'ta kontrolleri geri kazanÄ±n!

long.ar,th:
â­ï¸ Control your YouTube Shorts just like a normal YouTube video! Features include progress bar, seeking, playback speed, auto skip and more. You can also customize the keybinds to your liking!

List of features:
- Progress bar at the bottom with time and duration
- Seeking 5 seconds backward and forward with arrow keys (adjustable time)
- Mini timestamp and speed above the like button (can be scrolled on!)
- Decrease and increase playback speed with keys U and O
- Toggle to auto skip short when current one ends
- Control volume with the volume slider (scrollable) or with - and =, mute audio with M
- Customizable keybinds

Extra features:
- Start short from beginning with J
- Auto skip short with likes below custom threshold (e.g. 500 likes)
- Auto open comment section on each short
- Hide overlay on shorts (title, channel, etc.)
- Revert to normal speed with I or by clicking the speed button
- Navigate to previous or next short without animation with W and S
- Go to the next frame or previous frame with . and , while paused
- Upload date above video title

Fully open-source with MIT License: https://github.com/ynshung/better-yt-shorts

If you have any suggestions or feedback, please let us know here: https://github.com/ynshung/better-yt-shorts#issues--suggestion
long.am,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,el,en,en_AU,en_GB,en_U:
Notice: This extension is currently unmaintained, expect bugs and issues. If you are interested in maintaining this repository, please create an issue or submit changes via PR in GitHub or contact me@ynshung.com.


â­ï¸ Control your YouTube Shorts just like a normal YouTube video! Features include progress bar, seeking, playback speed, auto skip and more. You can also customize the keybinds to your liking!

List of features:
- Progress bar at the bottom with time and duration
- Seeking 5 seconds backward and forward with arrow keys (adjustable time)
- Mini timestamp and speed above the like button (can be scrolled on!)
- Fullscreen support with F key and double click
- Decrease and increase playback speed with keys U and O
- Click the speed button to revert to normal speed or toggle between different speeds
- Toggle to auto skip short when current one ends
- Control volume with the volume slider or with - and =, mute audio with M
- Customizable keybinds
- ğŸŒ Supports more than 10 languages!

Extra features:
- Start short from beginning with J
- Go to the next or previous frame of the video
- Set default playback rate when first opening shorts
- Auto skip short with likes below custom threshold (e.g. 500 likes)
- Auto open comment section on each short
- Hide overlay on shorts (title, channel, etc.)
- Go to the next frame or previous frame with . and , while paused
- View counter and upload date above video title

Fully open-source with MIT License: https://github.com/ynshung/better-yt-shorts

If you have any suggestions or feedback, please let us know here: https://github.com/ynshung/better-yt-shorts#issues--suggestion

long.fr:
â­ï¸ ContrÃ´lez les YouTube Shorts de la mÃªme maniÃ¨re qu'une vidÃ©o YouTube normale ! Cette extension fournit une barre de progression, la possibilitÃ© d'aller Ã  un moment d'une vidÃ©o directement (contrÃ´le de la barre de progression), l'ajustement de la vitesse de lecture, le passage automatique de vidÃ©o et bien d'autres fonctionnalitÃ©s. Il est Ã©galement possible de personnaliser les raccourcis clavier selon vos prÃ©fÃ©rences !

Liste des fonctionnalitÃ©s:
- Barre de progression en dessous avec l'horodatage et la durÃ©e de la vidÃ©o
- Avance/Recul rapide de 5 secondes avec les touches flÃ©chÃ©es (temps modifiable dans les paramÃ¨tres de l'extension)
- Horodatage de la vidÃ©o et contrÃ´le de la vitesse de lecture au-dessus du bouton "J'aime" (vitesse contrÃ´lable avec la molette)
- PossibilitÃ© de diminuer ou d'augmenter la vitesse de lecture avec les touches "U" et "O" respectivement
- Interrupteur qui permet de passer automatiquement les Shorts quand ceux-ci sont terminÃ©s
- ContrÃ´le du volume avec un curseur ou avec les touches "-" et "=", possibilitÃ© de rendre muet la vidÃ©o avec "M"
- Raccourcis clavier personnalisables

FonctionnalitÃ©s en plus:
- PossibilitÃ© de recommencer un Short avec la touche "J"
- Passage automatique des Shorts quand il n'y a pas un nombre minimum de "J'aime" (par exemple 500 "j'aime", la valeur est modifiable)
- Ouverture automatique des commentaires sur les Shorts
- Cacher automatiquement l'overlay (titre, chaÃ®ne, etc...)
- Retour Ã  la vitesse normale avec la touche "I" ou en cliquant sur le bouton de vitesse de lecture
- Navigation vers le Short prÃ©cÃ©dent ou suivant avec les touches "W" et "S" respectivement
- Lecture image par image avec les touches "." et "," quand le Short est en pause

ComplÃ¨tement open-source avec une licence MIT : https://github.com/ynshung/better-yt-shorts

Si vous avez des suggestions ou des retours d'expÃ©rience, n'hÃ©sitez pas Ã  nous les indiquer ici : https://github.com/ynshung/better-yt-shorts#issues--suggestion
long.he:
â­ï¸ Control your YouTube Shorts just like a normal YouTube video! Features include progress bar, seeking, playback speed, auto skip and more. You can also customize the keybinds to your liking!

âš ï¸ Note: This is a reupload of the original extension which is taken down due to trademark issue. Users are advised to check the GitHub website below from time to time for updates if the original extension is reinstated.

List of Features:
- Progress bar at the bottom with time and duration
- Seeking 5 seconds backward and forward with arrow keys
- Auto skip short when current one ends
- Auto skip short with likes below custom threshold (e.g. 500 likes)
- Auto open comment section on each short
- Decrease and increase playback speed with keys U and O
- Revert to normal speed with I or by clicking the speed button
- Control volume with the volume slider or with - and =, mute audio with M
- Mini timestamp and speed above the like button (can be scrolled on!)
- Navigate to previous or next short without animation with W and S
- Go to the next frame or previous frame with . and , while paused
- Customizable keybinds

Fully open-source with MIT License: https://github.com/ynshung/better-yt-shorts

YouTube Shorts is a trademark of Google LLC. Use of this trademark is subject to Google Permissions.

Disclaimer: We are not affiliated with Google LLC or YouTube in any official capacity. Our products, services, or content are not endorsed, sponsored, or approved by these entities. Any references to Google LLC or YouTube are purely for informational purposes, and the respective trademarks and logos are the property of their respective owners.
long.it:
â­ï¸ Control your YouTube Shorts just like a normal YouTube video! Features include progress bar, seeking, playback speed, auto skip and more. You can also customize the keybinds to your liking!

ğŸ¥³ Version 3 is launched! You don't need to refresh the shorts video anymore while changing keybinds or controlling the extra options. As always, please report any bugs in the link at the bottom.

List of features:
- Progress bar at the bottom with time and duration
- Seeking 5 seconds backward and forward with arrow keys (adjustable time)
- Mini timestamp and speed above the like button (can be scrolled on!)
- Decrease and increase playback speed with keys U and O
- Toggle to auto skip short when current one ends
- Control volume with the volume slider or with - and =, mute audio with M
- Customizable keybinds

Extra features:
- Start short from beginning with J
- Auto skip short with likes below custom threshold (e.g. 500 likes)
- Auto open comment section on each short
- Hide overlay on shorts (title, channel, etc.)
- Revert to normal speed with I or by clicking the speed button
- Navigate to previous or next short without animation with W and S
- Go to the next frame or previous frame with . and , while paused

Fully open-source with MIT License: https://github.com/ynshung/better-yt-shorts

If you have any suggestions or feedback, please let us know here: https://github.com/ynshung/better-yt-shorts#issues--suggestion

- Mini timestamp e velocidade acima do botÃ£o Gostei (scroll pode ser usado!)
- Diminua e aumente a velocidade de reproduÃ§Ã£o com as teclas U e O
- OpÃ§Ã£o para pular automaticamente o vÃ­deo curto quando o atual termina
- Controle o volume com o controle deslizante de volume ou com - e =, silencie o Ã¡udio com M
- Atalhos de teclado personalizÃ¡veis

Recursos adicionais:

- Oculte sobreposiÃ§Ãµes nos vÃ­deos (tÃ­tulo, canal, etc.)
- Volte Ã  velocidade normal com I ou clicando no botÃ£o de velocidade
- Navegue para o vÃ­deo curto anterior ou seguinte sem animaÃ§Ã£o com W e S
- Avance para o prÃ³ximo quadro ou quadro anterior com . e , quando pausado

Se vocÃª tiver alguma sugestÃ£o ou feedback, por favor nos informe aqui: https://github.com/ynshung/better-yt-shorts#issues--suggestion
